## About this tutorial

Welcome to this tutorial on quantifying taxonomic diversity in R!

Throughout this tutorial, **our aim is to show you different ways of quantifying the diversity of species in an ecosystem and to make you aware of the challenges involved in quantifying biodiversity**.

Hill number equation

$$
^qD = (\sum_{i=1}^{n}p_i^q)^{\frac{1}{1-q}} 
$$ {#eq-hill}
